headline.main: Djokovic Has Lost His Edge, Says Former Mentor Pilic
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Has Lost His Edge, Says Former Mentor Pilic

lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic has lost the tenacity which enabled him to rule men's tennis for a number of years, former mentor Niki Pilic said on Saturday.
snippet: Novak Djokovic has lost the tenacity which enabled him to rule men's tennis for a number of years, former mentor Niki Pilic said on Saturday....
